titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 2491) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 105 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 1996.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-354, by Mr. Dreier.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2491. Upon adoption of this resolution it shall be in order without intervention of any point of order to take H.R. 2491 from the Speaker's table and to consider in the House a motion to concur in the Senate amendment. The Senate amendment and the motion shall be considered as read. The motion shall be debatable for one hour. The previous question shall be considered as ordered on the motion to final adoption without intervening motion.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 131.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/18/1995--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of the Senate amendment to H.R. 2491 (budget reconciliation).
